plot: Bernard seems to not know where he is. he starts to tell his life story. A story of pain and rejection. Though he tries to withhold it, his darkest secret starts to unfold. Will you forgive him, for what he did?
title: Bernard
plot_es: Bernard seems to not know where he is. he starts to tell his life story. A story of pain and rejection. Though he tries to withhold it, his darkest secret starts to unfold. Will you forgive him, for what he did?
